Reading a [[scroll of detect curse]] will determine the [[cursed]] or uncursed status of all equipment currently in your inventory. If at least one cursed item is revealed, the scroll is identified.

==Strategy==
Using one scroll of detect curse with an inventory filled with unidentified gear will let you determine how safe it is to test-wield dozens of items at once. Just remember that some items may prove dangerous even when not cursed ([[distortion]], [[vampiricism]], [[Plutonium Sword|+GLOW]]).

==History==
Removed in [[0.11]].
